title: FS: T212 Obak Ten Million- SOLD
author: deadballera

posts.post_title: FS: T212 Obak Ten Million- SOLD
posts.post_content:
Ten Million (October 14, 1889 - June 18, 1964) was a minor league baseball player who played for various teams in the Northwestern League in the years prior to World War I. He is best known for his unusual name, and for his appearance in the T212 Obak series of baseball cards.



Lower Condition
